name: PlanetMap
description:
You are an intern at an observatory. Signals from all over the Solar System are being detected. Each signal carries unique information about the planet it's from. Your job as an intern is to figure out what name we gave to that planet.

Look for clues in the in game browser,  fill in a form and submit it for confirmation. If your guess was right, get guessing on your next signal.

Controls: mouse and keyboard.

Log in details: as long as the fields are non-empty, you can log in with any username/password combo. Yes, yes... not very secure, but it's frustration free!

Game Design, Art and Sound done by MiniLemonSupreme.
